articles.description: If Ezekiel Elliott continues his downward trend, it will be difficult for Dallas to continue justifying his exorbitant salary.
articles.content:
OXNARD, Calif. Ever since the Dallas Cowboys signed Ezekiel Elliott to one of the worst running back contracts in recent history, it has felt as if a clock was ticking on his departure.

articles.title: NBA rumors: Warriors not extending, losing Draymond would upset Steph Curry - NBC Sports
articles.description: Steph Curry would not be happy if the Warriors lost Draymond Green because the team wasn't willing to offer him an extension.
articles.content:
If the Warriors ended up losing Draymond Green because they didn't offer him a max extension, Steph Curry would not be a happy camper. 
He and all of Dub Nation.
